name: Brain Catch Rush
description:
Are you boring with the traditional game and want to some exciting game?

You are at right place. If you want to train and sharp your brain, BRAIN CATCH is perfect for you. This game is very useful for improving concentration and mind’s awareness, Addictive too.

You think it is a tough or complex game than you are wrong. Brain Catch is simple and user-friendly game who can play all ages people like kids, adult and also a senior citizen.

How to Play Brain Catch

You have to just keep same shape type pattern which coming from up and going on. If you want to change shape type just tap on the screen. There are two types of shape, Square and Round.

Collect the same type of shape and keep going on. The speed of upcoming shape will increase rapidly to test your attention and consciousness. Accumulate same type of shape and increase your scoreboard.

If you get the highest score and want to share with your friend, you can. Show your achievement in Facebook and Twitter sharing option.
You can also see your competitor score and according to it plan your game and beat your rival.

Brain Catch is an addictive and interesting game that no one is living without it after playing, at least, one time.

You think why I should play this game Right? See the features:
★ User-Friendly and handy User interface
★ Sharp your mental attention and visual sensitivity
★ Make your child smart and intelligent
★ Helpful in improving problem-solving and cognitive skills

So are you ready to take the challenge and full of the joy of spring with yourself.
